iati-activity.title: Strategic Note and Annual Work Plan West Africa
iati-activity.description: UN Women's WARO strategy covers and oversees the 7 countries in WARO that have developed their own AWPs. Within the five priorities will be the focus of work in 2012-2013: a) Funding mechanisms for increasing women’s political participation institutionalized; advocacy for implementation of affirmative Action (e.g. quotas) in partnership with ECOWAS. b) Empowering rural & cross border women entrepreneurs to access opportunities & financing from public & private sectors. c) Creating a functional platform of key actors (security, judiciary, health, social welfare, gender & CSOs) to promote a cross sectoral approach to addressing VAW. d) A pool of high level and community women mediators; Implementation of NAPs in post conflict countries. e) Engendering National GRB strategies.
